Load packages

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(tidyverse)
```

## R Markdown

This part loads the data. 

```{r}
newbot <- read.csv("rawData.csv")
```

This part plots the data with standard functions. The error and everything else has been calculated already
so we can easily plot the data over time. 

```{r}
newbot$Type <- as.factor(newbot$Label)
g2 <- ggplot(newbot, aes(x = as.numeric(Days), y = as.numeric(PercentMoving))) + geom_line(aes(color = Type))+geom_errorbar(aes(ymin = as.numeric(PercentMoving)-as.numeric(Error), ymax = as.numeric(PercentMoving)+as.numeric(Error)), width=.1)+geom_point(size = 0.2)+ylab("Percent Moving")+xlab("Days")
g2
```
